title: Investing in the BioRevolution Megatrend
itunes:title: Investing in the BioRevolution Megatrend
description:
Jamie Metzl, Senior Fellow at the Atlantic Council, and Jeremy Schwartz, Global Head of Research at Wisdomtree, discuss launching their BioRevolution Fund to invest in multiple fields including vaccines, agriculture and big data analytics.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
